thread.section_title: Apex City of London Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant rooms
thread.title_full: Brilliant rooms - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lindsey B
title: Brilliant rooms
text:
We stopped over for a long weekend in March and the room we had was fantastic. We booked a deluxe double and had a large seating area in a very well appointed room. The room seemed brand new and it felt like there might have been some refurbishment recently.
Great weekend. Great value versus other London hotels. Good location.
My only minor issue- when we came back after dinner (around midnight) the bar was all set up for breakfast the following day meaning there was nowhere to sit & enjoy a night cap. The two couple in the bar were marooned on the last two non-breakfast tables! We took out drinks back to our room. Definitely something to change - get a few sofas maybe!
